issue_description: Boot failure - system not reaching POST or BIOS
diagnostic_steps: 4. Test with minimal hardware (CPU + 1 RAM stick)

phase_1_hardware_diagnostics: Check all power connections (24-pin, 8-pin CPU, PCIe)
phase_2_bios_recovery: Download latest BIOS from MSI website
Use BIOS Flashback button if available
Wait for LED indicators during flash process
phase_3_component_testing: Test GPU in different PCIe slot
phase_4_advanced_troubleshooting: Test with POST card if available

msi_specific_procedures.bios_flashback: Most MSI boards have a BIOS Flashback button on rear I/O. Press and hold for 3-5 seconds with properly formatted USB drive.
msi_specific_procedures.debug_leds: Check motherboard for diagnostic LEDs indicating CPU, RAM, GPU, or boot device issues.
msi_specific_procedures.cmos_clear: Locate JBAT1 jumper near CMOS battery. Short pins 1-2 for 10 seconds with power off.

notes: This repair request is associated with Case 1FDV-23-0001009. All repair activities must be forensically documented with complete chain-of-custody.
